name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Define It (find the definition of any word)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search definition of words by right-clicking on them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Often find yourself googling the definition of weird words? Save your trouble by simply right clicking and finding out all the details about a word!
